PageDescription: Edit and co-author office documents within Moodle, an open-source learning platform and course management system.
WorkWithOfficeDocuments: Work with office documents within Moodle using ONLYOFFICE
EditAndCollaborateOnOfficeDocuments: Edit and collaborate on office documents online directly within Moodle course structure
DocumentsTab1Label: Upload, create and edit docs, sheets, slides, forms
DocumentsTab2Label: Navigate through PDF docs, add comments, annotations, drawings
DocumentsTab3Label: Share documents for viewing or real-time co-editing
DocumentsTab4Label: Prevent students from downloading and printing docs
QuoteText: "We absolutely recommend ONLYOFFICE to schools. Maybe there is dedicated software for companies, but if you want to control your data and have a collaborative and simple system to work with your students, that’s a great solution."
QuoteAuthorInfo: Physics and Chemistry, Robotics, Science and Technology teacher
CreateShareAndGradeStudentsAssignments: Create, share and grade students’ assignments
AssignmentsTab1Label: Build complex PDF forms adding different types of fields
AssignmentsTab2Label: Use docs, sheets, slides to prepare assignments
AssignmentsTab3Label: Share them with students so that they can easily fill in online and send you back
AssignmentsTab4Label: View and grade your students’ submissions
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Built to work in Moodle seamlessly
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Install ONLYOFFICE app for Moodle today from the Moodle App Marketplace
FeaturesAIHelper: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Mendeley and Zotero integration. <0>AI helper.</0>
FeaturesCoEditing: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, document comparison, comments & chat. Audio and video calls.
FeaturesFormats: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>. Fully compatible with MS Office formats.
FeaturesDesktopEditors: Online access from any device. Edit your Moodle documents in the desktop environment with <1>ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors</1>.
FeaturesOpenSourceCode: JWT. Watermarking and password protection. <0>Open source code</0> available on GitHub.
FeaturesFreeTrial: Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial.</0> Educational discounts.
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or sign up for <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>
HowToStartStep2: Get the plugins from the Moodle directory: <0>main integration plugin</0> / <1>Assign Submission plugin</1>.
HowToStartStep3: Follow the usual Moodle plugin installation steps.
LearnMoreHeading: Learn more about Moodle ONLYOFFICE integration
HowEnsuresDigitalEquality: How Collège-Lycée Sacré Cœur de Taravao ensures digital equality for all students using ONLYOFFICE and Moodle
WhyWeChoseMoodle: Why we chose Moodle for creating an ONLYOFFICE training center
NewUpdatesOfOOPlugins: New updates of ONLYOFFICE plugins for Moodle: PDF form creation and editing, Docs Cloud connection, certificate verification
NeedAnAppToConnect: Need an app to connect ONLYOFFICE Docs to your favorite web service? Or have you developed one?
